actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of cost-of-living increases in monthly social security benefits, railroad retirement annuities, public or private retirement, annuities, endowments, or similar plans or programs.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Revises the law governing veterans' benefits to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of cost-of-living increases in monthly social security benefits, railroad retirement annuities, public or private retirement, annuties endowments, or similar plans or programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of cost-of-living increases in monthly social security benefits, railroad retirement annuities, public or private retirement, annuities, endowments, or similar plans or programs.
